title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: There are benefits to standing out from the crowd. Your instinctive responses are usually refined and modest but your charismatic aura is almost magically captivating today. Of course, there could be some jangled nerves when gutsy action is taken, but you can make the most of your high profile by seizing a seemingly custom-made opportunity to advance your personal or professional agenda. In traditional wisdom it is best to strike while the iron is hot. Swap out timid for bold to achieve the best results. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
